name: Death, is that you?
description:
This is a game about escaping from the Death. It's a side-scroller made entirely in black and white. The reason of using just those colors is that is was made for the B&W Jam. The game was programmed in C++ using SDL2 and with no additional engine.

Attributions:

Music: "Last Breath" - Jim Hall (https://freemusicarchive.org/music/jim-hall/synth-kid-elsewhere/last-breath)

Jam notes:

All the assets, design and code were done by me within the timespan of the Game Jam, exceptuating the music.
